name: T-Shirt for Men and Women Unisex T-Shirt Gift
short_desc:
Touclo clothes


Note 1: We are Asian size. Asian size is a little smaller than US size. 1inch=2.54cm, 1cm=0.39inch.
Note 2: With the difference in the measurement methods, please allow 1-3cm in size deviation.
Note 3: There may be slight color difference, due to computer monitor settings.
Note 4: All of our products are 100% cotton with high quality, and we accept custom pictures.
Note 5: Washing instructions: * no bleach * inside out * cold water (no more than 30C).
